messages.subject: the cost of conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 12:30:51 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 12:30:51 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Oh goodness, I know I'd never be able to go and hold my head up if I
didn't pay my own way!!! >

Well, please don't let that bother you, if it gets you there!!
If it makes you feel any better, two years ago this time, I was on welfare.
I lost all pride over money at that time.......so if I can repay the world in
any way by bringing happiness to someone else, I'd like to do it!!

Ren

messages.subject: the cost of conferences
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 12:30:51 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 12:30:51 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I know I would donate. I hope you can
find a way to go. >>

I would too. We aren't rich, but we aren't hurting right now either. And I
work so I do have some disposable income....hence the trip to the conference.
So what do you say Kelly? Can we sponsor some families down on their luck?

Ren
